sourcesContent:
Valid input should contain only digits and commas(,)

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SorterService } from './services/sorter.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { numbers: string = ""; error: boolean = false; constructor(private service: SorterService) { } callSortApi(numbers: string, order: string) { if(this.error){ this.error = false; } let numArray: Array = this.validateInput(numbers); service.sort(numArray, order); } validateInput(numbers : String) : Array{ let numArray : Array = numbers.split(",").map(str => { if(isNaN(Number(str))){ this.error = true; throw new Error("invalid input"); } return Number(str); }) return numArray; }; title = 'numList'; }
